headdress@heaven.desc[1]: A headdress has been left here.
headdress@heaven.name: headdress
headdress@heaven.examine: It appears to belong to a chieftain.
headdress@heaven.desc[0]: A headdress has been left here.

ark@heaven.desc[1]: The Ark of the Covenant is here.
ark@heaven.name: ark
ark@heaven.examine:
The ark is two and a half cubits long, one and a half cubits wide, one and
a half cubits high, and is made made of shittim wood covered with pure
gold, with a crown of gold around it.  A ring of gold is set on each
corner, with two rings of shittim wood (overlayed with gold, of course) 
passing through them.
ark@heaven.desc[0]: The Ark of the Covenant is open.

tablet@heaven.name: tablet
tablet@heaven.examine:
Carved into the stones are ten commandments.  At the very bottom of each is
written:
		Jiffy Script, Incorporated
	    'Converse with us, We talk better.'

mjolnir@heaven.name: mjolnir
mjolnir@heaven.desc[0]: Mjolnir, the sacred hammer of Thor, has been left here.

vase@heaven.desc[1]: A vase made of ice has been set on a pedestal.
vase@heaven.name: vase
vase@heaven.examine:
The vase is made of a cloudy ice and is inscripted with images of great
glaciers.  Turning the vase over, you  see the incription:
		Jiffy Script, Incorporated
	    'Converse with us, We talk better.'
vase@heaven.desc[0]: A vase made of ice has been set on a pedestal.

axe@heaven.name: axe
axe@heaven.desc[0]: A bloodied battle-axe has been left here.

watermelon@heaven.desc[1]: A watermelon hangs temptingly from the Tree of Knowledge.
watermelon@heaven.name: watermelon

medicine@heaven.desc[1]: A medicine bag hangs suspended from a tree.
medicine@heaven.name: medicine
medicine@heaven.desc[0]: A medicine bag has been dropped here.

arrow@heaven.desc[1]: A silver arrow sticks up out of the ground.
arrow@heaven.name: arrow
arrow@heaven.examine: Silver is soft, so this cannot really damage anyone, can it?
arrow@heaven.desc[0]: A silver arrow sticks up out of the ground.

rainbow@heaven.name: rainbow
rainbow@heaven.desc[0]: A rainbow wraps around the room.

horned_helm@heaven.name: horned_helm
horned_helm@heaven.desc[0]: A great golden helm lies here.

volume@heaven.name: volume
volume@heaven.examine:
Mute is an attack spell for tournaments.  If you are mute, you cannot cast 
spells.  There is no known use for deafen.  If you think of one, do make a 
suggestion.
volume@heaven.desc[0]: &+YVolume XI&N of the &+WBook of Knowledge&N lies here.

eagle@heaven.desc[1]: An eagle feather is drifting down from the sky.
eagle@heaven.name: eagle
eagle@heaven.desc[0]: An eagle feather has been left here.

heaven10@heaven.title: Cloud 9
heaven10@heaven.description:
All is peaceful.  All around you flit angels with harps, singing
beautiful melodies full of joy and love.  Folds of the cloud form chairs
and couches to rest on.

heaven22@heaven.title: Sokkvabekk
heaven22@heaven.description:
The floor seems to be sinking.  All around you, cool murmuring water
laps the sides.  Two great chairs are here, seemingly for Odin and Saga to
sit in while they drink joyfully from gold goblets.

heaven21@heaven.title: Valaskjalf
heaven21@heaven.description:
You stand in the Hall of the Slain.  The roof is thatched with silver.
Below you, you see the spirits of all the slain creatures of the land.

heaven8@heaven.title: Seventh Heaven
heaven8@heaven.description:
Streams of milk and honey roll down the sides of the purple and white
mountains to water the green plains.  The blue sky plays host to a blue
moon and a golden sun, which is setting in magnificent splendor.
   To the west you spy a rainbow.  To the north you see a palace.

heaven6@heaven.title: The Garden
heaven6@heaven.description:
You are in a lush garden.  All forms of trees, flowers, and shrubbery
surround you.  All the creatures of the land and air approach you
innocently, and the creatures of the water leap out of a near-by lake to
give you their greetings.  You feel peaceful.
   To the south you see the glimmer of gold.

heaven34@heaven.title: The Southern Plains
heaven34@heaven.description: You stand in an arid land.  Tumbleweeds blow in the wind about you.

heaven11@heaven.title: Entrance to Heaven's Forest
heaven11@heaven.description:
You stand just within a vast forest.  The trees grow so close together 
that you have no choice but to walk the path, either to go down to Cloud 9
or to go deeper into the forest to the east.

heaven14@heaven.title: Cloud 13
heaven14@heaven.description:
You are in a simply furnished room which stands in stark contrast to the
diamond palace which contains it.

heaven5@heaven.title: Wilderness
heaven5@heaven.description:
You are wandering in the wilderness.  You have been here for so long
that you have lost track of the years.

heaven25@heaven.title: Valhalla
heaven25@heaven.description:
Looking up, you notice that the roof is made of shields, and the rafters
are spears.  Breast-plates litter the benches.  A wolf lurks at the western
door, and an eagle hovers over it.  A deep and wild looking river, Thund,
roars beside Valgrind, the outer gate.  Five hundred and forty doors lead
off in different directions, but you suspect that eight hundred warriors
stand behind each one, so you opt not to open any of them.

heaven33@heaven.title: Swamp
heaven33@heaven.description:
The earth sucks at your feet as you walk.  Off in the trees you can
hear the sounds of alligators in search of food.  It is getting dark.  The
alligators are hungry.

heaven19@heaven.title: Ydalir
heaven19@heaven.description:
You  are standing in series of dales.  Yews are growing here, and you
can see signs of Ull roaming about nearby.

heaven9@heaven.title: Cloud 8
heaven9@heaven.description:
The entire landscape is made of white, fluffy clouds.  You feel slightly
uneasy about the situation, as the thought of falling to the earth below
does not want to leave your mind.

heaven28@heaven.title: Northern Tundra
heaven28@heaven.description:
You are travelling in a land of ice and snow.  The sun and the
reflections from the brilliant white snow conspire to blind you, but
through squinted eyes you can catch sight of the stark, raw beauty.  Though
the wind howls about you, the cold does not seem to have any affect.

heaven4@heaven.title: Plains
heaven4@heaven.description:
You are on the plains.  To the west is a tent, to the east an untouched
wilderness, to north is a cloud bank, and to the south you can see the
ruins of a walled city.

heaven36@heaven.title: Home of the Great Spirit
heaven36@heaven.description:
The Great Spirit is not in right now, and there does not seem to be any
place to leave a message.

heaven7@heaven.title: Cloud 6
heaven7@heaven.description:
The soft, fluffy surface of the cloud is slightly strange to walk on,
and you notice for the first time that you do not have wings.

heaven32@heaven.title: Northeastern Forest
heaven32@heaven.description:
You are standing in a grove of maple trees.  To the east you spy the
ocean, upon which waves are breaking.

heaven30@heaven.title: Northern Plains
heaven30@heaven.description: Golden grass stretches as far as you can see in all directions.

heaven27@heaven.title: Vidi
heaven27@heaven.description: This is a land of long grass and saplings.

heaven29@heaven.title: Hardwood Forest
heaven29@heaven.description:
You stand under a canopy of leaves and intertwined branches.  Through
the trees, you can glimpse deep blue lakes, which you imagine to have been
created by the northern glaciers thousands of years ago.

heaven13@heaven.title: Diamond Palace
heaven13@heaven.description:
The entire palace is made of diamond.  The light from above is broken
into rainbows, and their glitterings seem to enchant you.

heaven23@heaven.title: Thrymheim
heaven23@heaven.description:
Mountains surround you.  A loud roar fills the air, though you can not
locate the source.  This hall once belonged to the great giant Thiazi, but
is now owned by his daughter, fair Skadi-- who was Njord's bride.

heaven18@heaven.title: The Silver Sea
heaven18@heaven.description: You are floating on a silver sea.

heaven12@heaven.title: Heaven's Forest
heaven12@heaven.description:
You on a path in a vast forest.  Above you is a palace seeingly made
of diamond.  To the east is a silver sea.  Below you you spy a land of
milk and honey.

heaven3@heaven.title: The Tabernacle
heaven3@heaven.description:
You are standing within a large tent.  To the east is a plain, while to
the west you can see the gates of pearl.

heaven37@heaven.title: &+WThe White Light
heaven37@heaven.description:
&+W This is a vast expanse of searingly bright white light.  A feeling of
&+Wpeace and serentity overwhelmes you as you gaze in awe into this endless
&+Wexpansion.  Time and space seem to stand still here, and you get the sense
&+Wthat this room is not of this world.

heaven2@heaven.title: Paradise Crossroads
heaven2@heaven.description:
You are standing at the place where the heavens meet.  Other than the
fact that you are standing on a cloud, this place seems rather ordinary.
To the north, you see a land of mountains and fjords, with a sign at the
beginning of the road which reads "Valhalla."  To the south you see a great
and varied land with a sign reading "The Happy Hunting Grounds."  To the
east you see you see a large tent with a firey cloud above it.

heaven24@heaven.title: Gladsheim
heaven24@heaven.description:
You heart suddenly feels lighter, filled with gladness.  Nearby, you can
see Valhalla, vast and gold-bright.

heaven17@heaven.title: The Place of Martyrs
heaven17@heaven.description: Strewn about this room are discarded crosses, gibbets, and stakes.

heaven39@heaven.title: &+WThe White Light
heaven39@heaven.description:
&+W This is a vast expanse of searingly bright white light.  A feeling of
&+Wpeace and serentity overwhelmes you as you gaze in awe into this endless
&+Wexpansion.  Time and space seem to stand still here, and you get the sense
&+Wthat this room is not of this world.

heaven26@heaven.title: Breidablik
heaven26@heaven.description:
You stand in Broad Splendour, Balder's hall.  The country around you is
beautiful, blessed and untainted by any evil.

heaven31@heaven.title: Northwestern Rainforest
heaven31@heaven.description:
Far to the west you can spy the blue of the ocean.  The abundant
vegetation causes you to believe that you are standing in a rainforest.
Dark clouds gather to the west.

heaven38@heaven.title: &+WThe White Light
heaven38@heaven.description:
&+W This is a vast expanse of searingly bright white light.  A feeling of
&+Wpeace and serentity overwhelmes you as you gaze in awe into this endless
&+Wexpansion.  Time and space seem to stand still here, and you get the sense
&+Wthat this room is not of this world.

heaven35@heaven.title: Land of Giants
heaven35@heaven.description: All around you are huge redwoods and sequoias.

heaven20@heaven.title: Alfheim
heaven20@heaven.description:
You stand in the god's gift to Freyr when he cut his first tooth.  The
light elves dance around you.

heaven15@heaven.title: Ruins of a walled city
heaven15@heaven.description:
You are standing in the ruins of a walled city.  One building stands,
with a rope hanging from an upper-story window.  It seems as if a battle
has taken place here.

heaven16@heaven.title: The Land of Gold
heaven16@heaven.description: The entire landscape is coated with gold.

heaven1@heaven.title: The Pearly Gates
heaven1@heaven.description:
You seem to be  standing on a cloud.  Before you stand a pair of huge
gates, which seem to be made of pearl.  The air about you is peaceful,
yet a tinge of expectancy can also be felt.

thorr@heaven.name: Thorr
thorr@heaven.description: Thor stands here glaring at Agnes.

bison@heaven.name: Bison
bison@heaven.description: A bison grazes upon the land here.

coyote@heaven.name: Coyote
coyote@heaven.description: A small coyote threatens to nip your ankles.

great@heaven.name: Great
great@heaven.description: The Great Bear is here eating honey.

terrance@heaven.name: Terrance
terrance@heaven.description: Terrance the ugly troll sits here preparing his dinner.  He looks hungry.

snake@heaven.name: Snake
snake@heaven.description: An snake with very narrow slits for eyes swishes around on the ground.

giant@heaven.name: Giant
giant@heaven.description: A giant was relaxing here until you walked in.

odin@heaven.name: Odin
odin@heaven.description: Odin glares at you with his one eye.

agnes@heaven.name: Agnes
agnes@heaven.description: Agnes laughs, prepared to meet all of Thor's needs.

petitioner@heaven.name: Petitioner
petitioner@heaven.description: A newly arrived petitioner floats calmly by.
